displayProperties.description: "You know Eris Morn, right? Creepy three-eyed old Hunter, too much foundation? Doesn't matter. She comes in and asks me how Io was and I say, wrong Vanguard, ask Ikora; and she's like, I was hoping that cache by the bones marked your grave; and I'm like, I'm an Exo, I left my bones behind a long time ago; and she goes, exactly. You get anything from that?" â€”Cayde-6
displayProperties.name: Io Treasure Map
